title: NetStruck
description: A ReactJS single-page application patterned after the UI of The Criterion Channel with some additional UX influence from Netflix. Like Netflix, you can browse through a catalog of films and add films to your personalized list, which persists via local storage.

title: MERN CRUD Blog
description: A MERN application where authenticated users can create, edit, and delete blog posts.

title: Seinfeld Trivia Game
description: A Who Wants to be a Millionaire inspired trivia game that tests your knowledge of Seinfeld quotes.

title: The Shallot
description: A humorously fictitious news media webpage I created in the vein of The Onion.
